inn1.comm: hits a good length right away, the ball pitched just outside off stump and seamed away from the right-hander, it carried through nicely to the wicketkeeper as well

Stelling strikes, the ball was almost identical to the first only a little closer to the batsman, it pitched around off stump and moved away from Poonia, forcing him to fend at it, the ball kissed the outside edge and Smits took an easy catch
pitches just outside off stump on a good length, Watson goes on the back foot and plays it late, angling it wide of point to get off the mark
fuller ball angling across the left-hander, Haq leans on to the front foot and pushes it towards cover, he calls for the single but is sent back by Watson
Stelling over-steps to concede the first extra of the innings, Haq plays it late with an open face towards point
short of a length ball pitching on middle and off, Haq drives towards cover on the front foot
Stelling strays on to leg stump and Haq flicks off his hips down to fine leg, the ball hit the thigh so he's not yet off the mark
fullish ball on leg and middle, Haq moves on to the front foot and plays it to midwicket
gentle pace from Reekers, 113 kmh, Haq defends to point on the front foot
this is marginally quicker at 114 kmh, Haq moves forward again and defends to mid-off
that was close, Reekers bowled that straighter and Haq got half a stride in and the ball nicked the inside edge before thudding into the pad
outstanding timing, Reekers errs on the fuller side and Haq eases on to the front foot and unfurls a sublimely timed cover drive that races to the fence
punched towards mid-off on the front foot for a single
Stelling nips one back into Haq and nearly cuts him in half
pitches on off stump and angles away from the left hander, Haq plays it really late and dabs it wide of point for a single

van Bunge's dropped a stter at slip! Haq fished at one that was slanting away from him and got a healthy edge that flew at head height towards Bunge, the ball seemed to burst through his hands even though it wasn't travelling quickly
left alone outside the off stump, Stelling is getting it to shape away from the right hander
defended on the back foot
defended on the front foot towards point
Reekers is sticking to a fullish wicket-to-wcket line, giving the batsman no room at all, defended back to the bowler

and the stump-to-stump line works! Reekers bowls one dead straight and the ball breaches Haq's defences, he tried to play across the line to that one and heard the sound of timber moments after he missed, van Bunge will be a relieved man
Fuller ball on off stump, Hamilton gets a long stride in and defends towards cover
Reekers pitches on leg and middle, Hamilton moves across his stumps and flicks the ball down to fine leg where a mis-field allows the second
driven to point on the front foot
Hamilton gets on to the front foot and drives firmly to md-off, Reekers finishes a succesful over
Stelling bowls it a short of a length on middle and off stump, Watson tries to pull but it's not short enough for that, he gets an inside edge on to his body
defended solidly on to the front foot
Stelling drifts on to middle and leg, Watson moves across his stumps to play it towards square leg
ptches on off stump and nips back into Hamilton who's a little surprised at the movement off the pitch, he gets an inside edge towards the leg side
fuller length and wider outside the off stump, Hamilton gets on to the front foot and defends towards cover
straighter line from Stelling and Hamilton moves his front foot acroos towards off and closes the face of the bat to play the ball through square leg
Reekers persists with the nagging off stump line, Hamilton blocks it back to the bowler
and again the line is off stump and the length is perfect, Hamilton defends back to the bowler
this time he loses his radar and sprays it down leg side, wide called
defended firmly on the front foot towards midwcket
Reekers bowls it a little shorter and a fraction straighter, Hamilton flicks the ball through midwicket for a single
off stump to off stump line, Watson defends on the front foot
Reekers finishes another tight over with a good ball on off stump, Watson blocks towards cover
a bit on the fuller side outside off stump, Hamlton gets on to the front foot and drives but mis-times the shot to mid-off

Stelling has his second, Hamilton moves across to one that pitches on middle and swings towards leg stump, he misses the flick and is hit just below the knee roll, Asoka de Silva says that was going to hit and Hamilton isn't happy, he's got to go though and replays show the ball hitting leg

Stelling is on a hat-trick! Stelling pitches that on off and middle and the ball angles into the right-hander, Brown gets half forward and the ball hits him low on the pad in front of middle, easy decision for de Silva to make
in the channel outside off stump, the batsman lets the hat-trick ball go through to the wicketkeeper
fuller ball on off and middle stump, defended towards midwicket
pushed towards covers on the front foot
this is a Mark Ealham-esque line and length from Reekers, and the pace is rather similar as well, defended on the front foot
Reekers continues to peg away at off stump, the batsman defends on the off side
Watson gives Reekers the charge but is n no position to play any sort of shot
Reekers sprays it well wide of off stump, Asoka de Silva calls it late but says it's wide
Watson pulls towards midwicket where Ryan ten Doeschate mis-fields to allow the single
punched towards cover on the front foot
lovely line and length outside off stump, the batsman gets drawn into the cover drive and the ball beats the outside edge
pitches on a good length outside off stump and moves a shade away fromt the right hander who lets it go through to Smits
this one goes straight into the right-hander, Watson gets forward and gets hit on the top of the pad
Watson charges down the wicket again and finds that the length is just too good, he ends up defending it to cover
tight line and length on off stump, defended towards point on the front foot
Watson charges again and this time Stelling cramps him for room by angling the ball into him, Watson gets beaten and hit on the pad
fuller ball on the pads, Watson moves across and gets a bit of pad on it as it trickles towards the fine leg
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
flashes outside the off stump and the resulting edge flies wide of second slip to third man
fuller length and the batsman uses the width outside off stump to free his arms and drive to point
fullish length wide outside off, McCallum plays a flamboyant drive but gets beaten
better length from Reekers, just held it back a bit, McCallum gets a stride in and defends towards cover
off and middle stump line, McCallum moves on to the front foot and gets an inside edge on to paad
Stelling floats it through in the channel outside off stump, Watson lets it go
a touch on the shorter side outside off stump, Watson cuts hard but straight at the man at point
good length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot towards cover
Watson takes a step down yet again, he isn;t to the pitch of the ball and drives half-heartedly, the outside edge goes towards point
Watson stays in his crease this time and blocks
full ball on the pads, Watson tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads
good length from Reekers on off stump, McCallum defends on the front foot
cut down to third man for a single, there's a fumble in the deep but the batsman don't capitalise
defended solidly on the front foot, but the runs are no where in sight
Watson breaks some of the shackles, he steps down the pitch and pulls through midwicket for  four, he didn't hit that perfectly but he's got enough to send it to the ropes
Reekers drags it a fraction too short and wide, Watson cuts though point and beats the infield to collect his second four
flicked off his pads for single through square leg
tight line on off stump from Stelling, played to point
cut to point on the back foot
Stelling oversteps and bowls it on leg stump, the batsman flicks through square leg for one

dropped! van Bunge grasses another sitter, Stelling bowls it full and wide tempting the batsman into the drive, McCallum went fot it and got a thick edge to first slip wher van Bunge muffs another dolly
Watson rocks back and uses the width on offer to thread the cut shot through point, he's timed that superbly
defended on the front foot to mid-on
fuller ball on off stump, the batsman moves forward and drives to mid-off
pitches wide outside off stump, Smits is standing up to the stumps, McCallum lets t go
fuller ball on off stump, McCallum opens the face to play it to third man for a single
tight line and length on off stump, Watson gets on to the front foot and defends

de Leede takes a blinder! He bowled that full to Watson who absolutely hammered the straight drive back at de Leede at head height, de Leede gets his hands up in time, parries the ball, and takes it on the second attempt, brilliant reflexes
full and outside off stump, Smith lets it go
hits a good length on off stump, Smith gets forward and defends towards cover point
full ball drifting down leg side, wide called
just short of a driving length and on the stumps, played back down the ptch to the bowler with a straght bat
slightly fuller on and still on the stumps, prodded at, off the inside edge to the leg side
pushed through fuller, just outside the off, swing and a miss, that was awfully close to the inside edge
good-length ball on the stumps, defended very watchfully
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left alone to the keeper
full and straight, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
full and straight, punched back to the on side, third powerplay on now
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper who is standing up to the stumps and gathers smartly
slower ball, on the stumps, spotted early by the batsman who goes down on one knee and swats the ball over square-leg. Fifth boundary of the innings!
fullish and on the stumps, defended carefully
and once again, fullish and on the stumps, defended carefully
very full and very straight, defended carefully back down the pitch to end the over
down the track and BANG! Welcome to the attack Jonkman! Smith comes down the track, goes down on one knee and smashes that through cover. That s a cracking shot!
defended back to the bowler
just short of a good length and on the stumps, worked away to the on side with soft hands
another waltz down the pitch, this time the bowler adjusts and follows the batsman, swing and a miss, through to the keeper
short of a length and just outside the off, Smith gives himself just a bit of room and chops that away very fine to the third-man fence
slightly short, drifting down leg, a touch too short, worked away down to fine-leg in a swivelled pull
good-length ball on the stumps, quite straight, no real movement in the air or off the pitch, defended watchfully
overpitched and on the stumps, punched back down the pitch to the bowler who fields easily
little offcutter this time, chopped hard but straight to the man at point
back of a length and on the stumps, clipped to the leg side for a single
outside off, cut played and missed, through to the keeper

short one banged in, McCallum goes for the pull ... he's not in control at all. The ball spears off the top edge and would you believe it, amidst shouts of "catch it" sails over fine-leg for six! That tells you how short the straight boundaries are
fullish and outside the off, defended towards cover with an angled bat
swatted to mid-off
full and outside the off stump, left alone to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off stump, slanting in, punched to cover
full ball drifting down leg side, Smith tries to flick it behind square but misses and gets hit on the pad

short of a length outside off stump, Smith plonks a foot forward and hits cleanly through the line to send the ball soaring over mid-on, he hasn't timed that all that well but the ball reaches the ropes
that's far too wide outside the off stump
full ball outside off stump, McCallum drives powerfully at Ryan ten Doeschate at cover who fields with his chest
defended on the front foot
de Leede strays wide outside off stump yet again
he overcompensates by bowling one full and on mddle and leg stump, McCallum drives it superbly down the ground for four
tight line on off stump, defended on the front foot
drifts down leg side this time, McCallum tries to sweep and gets a top edge to fine leg
ths is a poor over, de Leede finsihes with a short and wide one outside off stump that McCallum dispatches to the fence with a powerful cut off the back foot
full toss on leg stump, McCallum tries to flick but misses, Smith sets off for the leg bye and had there been a direct hit from mdwicket he was a goner
cut hard off the back foot to point
full ball drifting on to middle and leg, Smith leans across and flicks but doesn't beat the man at square leg
timber! Jonkman pitches one just outside off stump and nips it back into Smith who thrusts his bat out, the ball takes the inside edge and hits the top of leg stump
good line and length on off stump, defended towards point on the off side
short of  a length outside off stump, defended to point off the back foot
defended on the front foot to silly point
McCallum tries to sweep but gets hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
bowled quicker through the air on off stump, defended on the back foot
McCallum begins to come forward and stops in his tracks and defends to the off side
too short and too wide, McCallum rocks on to the back foot and cuts through point, the fielder gives valiant chase but the timing is just too good for him
defended on the front foot towards cover
Jonkman loses control and sprays it wide outside off stump
short of a length on off stump, the batsman stands up on the back foot and plays it down to point
fuller length on off stump, McCallum moves forward and defends
caught at gully! Jonkman bowls it wide outside off stump again and McCallum cuts hard, he doesn't keep it down and hits it straight to Stelling who takes the catch at stomach height
Jonkman fires in the yorker and Blain does well to keep it out
defended on the front foot back to the bowler, Jonkman is keeping it tight around off stump
good length ball outside off stump, Blain has a look at it and decides to let it go
tossed up nicely on off stump, Wright gets forward and defends, the inside edge goes wide of the man at short leg
defended back to the bowler
bowled flatter and quicker on off stump, that turns a bit into the right-hander and he defends back to the bowler on the back foot

Kashif gets into the act! He bowls one quicker and wider outside off stump, Wright gives him the charge and tries to drive, he isn't anywhere near the pitch of the ball and gets beaten, Smits whips off the bails in a trice
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
pushed through quickly outside the off stump, Rogers thrusts his pad out and lets it go
banged in short of  a length outside off stump, that carries through at chest height to Smits
fuller ball angling into middle and leg stump, Blain closes the face of the bat to play it through midwicket
good length ball just outside off stump, Rogers is late on hs defensive shot and gets an inside edge
Jonkman over-pitches outside the off stump, Rogers gets a long stride in and times the square drive to perfection through point, lovely shot
Jonkman responds wth a sharp bouncer, Rogers gets out of the way
full and straight from Jonkman, Rogers tries to play the on-drive through midwicket but gets a thick inside edge behind square leg
bowled flat on off and middle stump, Blain goes back in his crease and defends

dropped at slip again! Kashif lets it rip outside off stump, Blain lunges forward and  gets an edge, the wicketkeeper misses it and the ball bounces off his pads towards first slip who also drops the chance
edged once again, this time wide of slip and the ball runs down to the third man fence
that's a shocking half-tracker, Rogers jumps on to the back foot and pulls hard past mid-on for four more
Smits missing a stumping! Rogers pushes forward at one and gets betaen, he drags his back foot just outside the crease but Smits doesn't collect the ball cleanly
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
strays down leg side first up, the ball bounces a second time before it reaches Smits
and again, another wide down leg side, poor start from ten Doeschate
full ball outside off stump, driven on the front foot to mid off
short of a length on middle and leg stump, Blain tucks it off his hips for a single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
short and wide outside off stump, Rogers goes back and cuts hard in the air through gully for four more to the third-man fence
full ball outside off stump, far too wide and Rogers jams down at it and runs the ball fine to the third man boundary
straighter line on middle stump this time, Rogers tries to play it through square leg but mis-times the shot
defended to mid-on off the front foot
tossed up outside off stump, Blain drives at it but gets beaten
defended to mdwicket on the front foot
tossed up slowly on off and middle stump, the batsman closes the face to play it through midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, the batsman plays a loose drive and edges it to short third man
pushed through quickly on off stump, Blain goes back in his crease and defends back to the bowler
pitches on off and middle and cuts into the right-hander, Rogers gets beaten for pace
full ball on off stump, driven firmly back to the bowler
fires the yorker into middle and leg stump, Rogers does well to dig it out, this is a far better over from ten Doeschate so far
full and in the slot for the drive outside off stump, Rogers drives powerfully but straight at cover
once again Rogers drives hard but Kashif dives at extra cover to save runs
this time Rogers hammers the cover drive through the infield, ten Doeschate was lucky to get away with those last three balls
tossed up outside the off stump, Rogers moves outside off and defends
floated through on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
blocked to the man at short leg on the back foot this time
Kashif pushes ths quickly through on off stump, the ball turns into the right-hander and he defends on the back foot
punched through covers on the front foot for a single
defended to silly point on the front foot
good length delivery on the stumps, no room to work it to the on side, and he has to lunge forward in defense
drifts to middle and leg and he just taps it in front of midwicket for one
back of a length on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it to square but resists the run
half-volley on leg stump, Blain gets on top of it and clips it in the gap at midwicket for three, well done
back of a length and moving in from middle, tapped to the on side
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts to cover
edged and gone! The quicker one lands short and spins in, Rogers stands deep in his crease and tickles at it, and Smits snaps up the thin edge!
tossed up on off stump, Hoffman gets forward and defends to cover
a fraction too full outside off stump, Hoffman frees his arms and lofts the cover drive over the infield  to reach the fence
Hoffman tries to hammer it through the leg side and gets a top edge that falls safe at short third man
defended on the front foot
blocked on the front foot to short leg
tossed up on the middle stump line, Hoffman has a swing, the bottom-hand comes out of the handle, and the ball rolls past square-leg
low fulltoss, on the middle, driven to long-on
nicely flighted and what's more, it dipped and jabbed away back to the bowler

Oh so close! Appeal for stumping. It was a flighted delivery on the leg and middle stump line and turned away. Hoffman had a swing but was beaten in the flight and then by the turn. The 'keeper Smits whipped the bails off and appealed. It was referred upstairs and the verdict was not out. It must have been touch and go. It appeared as if the back foot was on the line but some part must have been dragged behind and inside the crease.
again done in by the flight, and the drive produces an edge that takes the delivery to backward point
retains the strike with a drive down to long-on
leans forward, dabs a fullish delivery to the off side
spins in from outside off, bit of width, but cut straight to backward point
dispatched to the cow corner. The good' old slog-sweep. Tossed up on the middle and he went down on a bent-knee and thwacked it to deep midwicket
And again. Another tossed-up delivery, another swing of the bat and the ball soars over deep midwicket.
Dropped. Tough chance though. On the off and middle stump line, turns in, flicked hard to the right of short-leg fielder who stretches his right hand out but can't hold on

It's all over. Scotland have folded up cheaply. A flighted delivery on the middle and off stump line produced a lofted drive but he was beaten in the flight and the dip. Ended up ballooning it towards mid-off and he is a goner.

inn2.comm: good line adn length to start with, just outside off stump, Zuiderent moves on to the front foot and defends towards cover
good length on off stump, Zuiderant gets a stride in and defends to cover
just short of a length outside off stump, Zuiderant got his front foot forward and played an ambitious cover drve, the ball swung away from him and beat the outside edge
nearly in the blockhole, flicked off the pads through square leg for one
short ball on leg stump, you can't bowl there with fine leg in the circle, Reekers moves across and pulsl behidn square for four
that one swings away from Reekers after ptching on a good length just outside off stump, Reekers comes down the pitch and drives airly at it but gets beaten
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot
short and wide outside the off stump, Zuiderant uses the width, gets under it and cuts hard and in the air to the point fence, powerful shot and a statement of intent here from the Dutch
toos hort and wide again from Blain, Zuiderant moves back and cuts hard along the ground in front of point for four more
Blain replies wth a snorter, that burst off a good length and rapped Zuiderant, who got on the front foot, on the gloves, superb ball
on a good length around off stump, Zuiderant moves forward and blocks towards cover
short of a length ball climbs on Zuiderant, he moves back in his crease and defends
good length and line, angling into off stump, Reekers gets back and across and defends back to the bowler
excellent ball, pitched on a good length outside off stump and swings away from Reekers who hangs his bat out at it and gets beaten
superb timing, Reekers moves forward to  a good length ball on off and middle and drives past the bowler, he's not hit that hard at all, just timed it beautifully
flicked to midwicket on the front foot
full toss on off and middle, driven to mid-on for a single
Hoffman finishes with a yorker that Zuiderant digs out

caught at mid-off! Reekers tries to hit down the ground but the ball hit the outside half of the bat and spoons up to Wright at mid-off who takes the easiest of catches, Netherlands lose their first wicket
dabbed short of midwicket for a quick single
short and wide outside off stump, Szwarczynski uses the width to cut over gully, he's placed that wide enough of third man to reach the fence
full ball on off stump, dug out towards cover
pitching on a good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards midwcket
full ball outside off stump, in the slot for the cover drive, Szwarczynski drives to the man at cover
driven hard into the ground on the off side and they run a quick single
good length ball outside off stump, that one swung away from Szwarczynski who lets it go
pitches on a good length outside off stump and swings away from Szwarczynski, left alone again
defended on the front foot behind square on the off side, Hoffman cut that one back into the right-hander instead of taking it away
full ball outside off stump, Szwarczynski leans forward and places the cover drive perfectly, though he hit that with the bottom of the bat it was timed well enough to reach the fence
outstanding shot, Hoffman bowls it too full on middle and leg, Szwarczynski drives powerfully down the ground for four more
full ball on the pads, Zuiderant moves across his stumps and flicks over midwicket for four more, Netherlands are racing away here
played with soft hands towards midwicket for a quick single
tight line and length on of stump, defended back to the bowler on the front foot

good length ball on middle stump, Szwarczynski takes a step down and tries to pull even though it is not short enough for the stroke, the ball hits the top edge and flies high in the air to the wicketkeeper Smith who takes the steepling catch with ease
Blain strays far down leg side, wide called
defended on the front foot to midwicket
good length ball on off stump, defended to point on the front foot
good length ball on off stump, defended towards cover point on the front foot
fuller length angling into off stump, ten Doeschate gets on to the front foot and defends to cover
short and wide outside the off stmp, ten Doeschate moves back and cuts hard wide of the fielder on the third man fence
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
loud appeal for leg before, ten Doeschate gets hit on the pad by one that cuts back in to him, the impact on the pad was just outside off stump
short of a length and wide outside off stump, ten Doeschate runs it down to the fine leg fence where Majid Haq saves one run with an awkward save
fuller length and on leg stump, ten Doeschate moves across his stumps and flicks it to the fine leg fence, Netherlands are fnding the ropes with alarmingly regularity if you're supporting Scotland
defended on the front foot towards cover
short of  a length ball on off stump, the unusually high bounce squares up ten Doeschate and he plays it to point wth an open face
driven hard back at the bowler and Blain does well to get down it time and get a hand on it, that was a certain boundary if he hadn't fielded that
defended on the back foot towards cover
slower ball in the channel outside off stump, ten Doeschate tries to run it to third man but misses
pitches outside off stump and swings away from the right-hander, left alone by the batsman
short and wide outside off stump, Zuiderant moves back and cuts over point for four to bring up Netherlands' fifty
full ball down leg side, glanced off the pads down to fine leg for a single
good length ball on off stump, defended on the back foot towards cover
left alone outside the off stump, Smith does well to take one that bounces a bit more while standing up to the stumps
Wright strays on to leg stump again, the batsman moves across and flicks to short fine leg for a single
defended off the pads towards midwicket on the back foot
far too full and on leg stump, ten Doeschate flicks off his toes to wide mid-on where Haq mis-fields to allow the second run
in the channel outside off stump, ten Doeschate tries to run it to third man but is beaten by the slower delivery

excellent shot, that's a fraction short and ten Doeschate jumps across towards off stump with his left leg in the air and flicks it neatly behind square for four more, that was laced with Calypso flair
defended towards cover on the front foot
another slower ball nearly beats ten Doeschate who gets squared up around the off stump and defends
good length delivery outside off stump, pushed to point, 'WAIT' is the call
drifts to leg stump and he flicks it straight to midwicket
quicker, short of a length delivery and he stands upright and punches back to the bowler
good length delivery outside off stump, asking him to drive, but he lunges forward and defends
back of a length delivery this time, he stands up and defends
good length delivery just outside off stump, defended
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
fuller and flatter, he gets over it and defends to cover
tossed up, no spin at all, left alone
quicker in the blockhole, he digs it out towards mid-off
nice loop on that one, lands full around off stump, defended back to Rogers
quicker one on off stump, defended and thats a maiden over as they go in for lunch
good length ball angling into off and middle from over the wicket, Zuiderant takes a stride forward and defends
sharp pace just outside the off stump, defended towards point on the front foot
too full from Wright and he strays on to leg stump as well, Zuiderant moves across his stumps and flicks through midwicket for two more
width offered outside off stump, Zuiderant moves back and cuts hard, Haq runs across on the third man fence and cuts off the boundary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
fuller ball outside the off stump, Zuiderant moves forward and drives to point
too short outside the off stump, ten Doeschate moves on to the back foot and cuts hard, he's placed that fine enough to beat short third man and will get four
defended on the front foot behind square on the off side
the ball hits pad frst just outside the line of off stump and Rogers appeals confidently but to no avail
defended on the front foot
tossed up slowly on off stump, ten Doeschate moves on to the front foot and blocks
defended towards silly point on the front foot
full length ball on off and middle, Zuiderant closes the face to play it to square leg
good length ball outside off stump, Zuiderant opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down to third man
what happened there? That ball angled towards leg stump but swung away from the right-hander and squared him up, the ball hit the outside edge of the bat and ran down to third man
dabbed to mdwicket on the back foot for a sharp single

short and wide outside the off stump, that line is inadvisable at the best of times and especially so when third man is in the circle, ten Doeschate cuts and gets a top edge down to the third man fence
defended on the front foot towards cover
tossed up on off stump, Zuiderant leans forward and defends back to the bowler
Zuiderant inside-edges an attempted on-drive to square leg
short and wide outside off stump, ten Doeschate cuts and beats short third man and collects another boundary in that region
outstanding shot! ten Doeschate dances down the track and swings through the line, he's hit that miles and the ball bounces on the roof over long-on boundary, impressive hit!
that was the arm ball that went straight on and beat ten Doeschate on the back foot
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
good line and length to begin with, on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover point
tight line on off stump, no room for the batsman to work with, Zuiderant defends on the front foot
short of a length outside off stump, Zuiderant plays it late with an open face towards backward point
full ball outside off stump, Zuiderant drives at it and gets a thick edge down to third man where Majid Haq picks it up inside the boundary
excellent line on off stump, ten Doeschate drives on the front foot to cover

outstanding ball, and Brown can't believe he's not got a wicket, that pitched on middle and leg and straightened, ten Doeschate got squared up and beaten comprehensively, Brown appeals for lbw but de Silva says not out, that hit ten Doeschate on the back leg in front of off stump and ran down for four leg byes, that was pretty plumb
starts off with a full toss that is mis-hit to mid-on
bowled flat and full outside off stump, Zuiderant moves on to the front foot and drives through cover for four more
another full toss and Zuiderant hits it straight to mid-on
Zuiderant misses out on another full toss, hits it straight to cover this time
the quicker ball beats Zuiderant as he goes back in hs crease, the ball hit him in front of middle, Haq roars an appeal but the umpre is unmoved, that was very close as well, looked out
defended on the front foot
played off the pads to midwicket
full ball angling into middle and leg, flicked through midwicket for a single
Brown keeps it in the channel outside off stump, Zuiderant pushes forward and gets an edge down to third man for a single
Brown strays on to leg stump this time, ten Doeschate moves across his stumps and flicks through square leg for one

tight line and length on off and middle, Zuiderant pushes towards cover and sets off for a single but gets sent back, the man at cover fumbles but recovers quickly and fires the throw towards the wicketkeeper, a direct hit would have been interesting
driven to mid-off on the front foot
ten Doeschate steps down the track to Haq, realises he isn't to the pitch of the ball and defends
defended to midwicket on the front foot
short and wide outside off stump, ten Doeschate has played the cut superbly today and he does so again, he beats short third man and gets four more
defended on the front foot towards the off side
dropped short once again, ten Doeschate rocks back and pulls to the man patrolling the deep midwicket fence
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Zuiderant takes it on the bounce and drives to mid-on
played with soft hands in front of point on the back foot
fuller length on middle and leg stump, ten Doeschate moves across and flicks to the fielder at midwicket
punched on the front foot towards mid-off, the man at cover intercepts the ball and mis-fields
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
excellent placement and timing, Brown strays on to middle and leg, Zuiderant flicks wide of the man at midwicket, Wright gives chase and pulls it in just inside the ropes
pitching on off stump and angling into the right-hander, played to midwicket on the front foot
Haq tosses it up on off stump, Zuiderant drives hard into the ground through covers for a single
defended to midwicket on the front foot
defended to midwicket on the front foot once more
Zuiderant takes a step down, meets the ball on the bounce and drives wide of mid-on for four more
good length ball pitching just outside off stump and angling into the right-hander, ten Doeschate runs it to short third man
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
fuller ball on mddle and leg, ten Doeschate gets into poston in a flash and flicks between midwicket and mid-on for four, he brings up his fifty with that shot, t's been a delightful innngs
he's in a hurry to get this over with, Brown gives him a little room and ten Doeschate cuts and cuts hard, that races to the fence
massive hit, ten Doeschate picks up the length early and, with a  free swing of his bat, sends the ball soaring over the midwicket fence, amazing timing
driven to mid-on off the front foot
Zuiderant takes a step down and tries to hit over the leg side, he gets an inside edge to short fine leg
defended towards midwicket on the front foot
ten Doeschate steps down the track, takes the ball on the full and flicks powerfully through midwicket for four more
this time he takes the aerial route and lofts Haq over mid-on for four, just two needed now
strays down leg side, wide called and the scores are tied
that's the victory, ten Doeschate steps down the pitch and pulls a full toss through midwicket for four, ten Doeschate finishes with 70 off 68 balls, a top innings
